hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select EODP_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, REC_VER, REC_STATUS, ORG_ID, EODP_CODE, EODP_NAME, EODP_NAME_EN, EODP_CUSTOMER_CODE, EODP_CUSTOMER_NAME, EODP_ORDER_TYPE_CODE, EODP_ORDER_TYPE_NAME, EODP_TRANSPORT_TYPE_CODE, EODP_TRANSPORT_TYPE_NAME, EODP_REMARK, PM_CODE from EO_DIVIDE_PARAM EODP where 1 = 1 <<and EODP.ORG_ID = :orgId>> <<and EODP.PM_CODE LIKE '%' || :pmCode || '%' >> <<and EODP.REC_STATUS = :recStatus>> <<and EODP.EODP_CODE like '%' || :eodpCode || '%'>> <<and EODP.EODP_NAME like '%' || :eodpName || '%'>> <<and EODP.EODP_NAME_EN like '%' || :eodpNameEn || '%'>> <<and EODP.EODP_TRANSPORT_TYPE_CODE like '%' || :eodpTransportTypeCode || '%'>> <<and EODP.EODP_TRANSPORT_TYPE_NAME like '%' || :eodpTransportTypeName || '%'>> <<and EODP.EODP_ORDER_TYPE_CODE like '%' || :eodpOrderTypeCode || '%'>> <<and EODP.EODP_ORDER_TYPE_NAME like '%' || :eodpOrderTypeName || '%'>> <<and EODP.EODP_CUSTOMER_CODE like '%' || :eodpCustomerCode || '%'>> <<and EODP.EODP_CUSTOMER_NAME like '%' || :eodpCustomerName || '%'>> <<AND EODP.EODP_ORDER_TYPE_CODE IN (:eodpOrderTypeCodes)>> <<AND EODP.EODP_ORDER_TYPE_NAME IN (:eodpOrderTypeNames)>>
